name: Eagle Style
description: A martial art focusing on fast, precise kicks to close distance. Popular among agile fighters who prefer aerial combat and quick gap-closing maneuvers.
howToObtain: Reach Level 50 in the Strength skill tree
tips: Best paired with mobility-focused clans like Boogie Woogie. Use Flash Kick to initiate combos.

name: Taido Martial Arts
description: Yuji Itadori's signature style. Uses full body rotation for devastating impacts. The core philosophy is maximizing power through rotational momentum.
howToObtain: Complete the 'Path of the Vessel' questline
tips: Combine Divergent Fist with Black Flash for massive damage. Time your Manji Kicks during enemy recovery.

name: Judo / Grappling
description: Defensive grappling style focusing on throws and counters. Excellent for punishing aggressive opponents and controlling the pace of combat.
tips: Use Counter Grip when opponents try to rush you. Ground Slam deals extra damage near walls.

name: Boxing
description: Classic Western boxing style emphasizing powerful punches and head movement. Perfect for sustained close-range combat with quick jabs and devastating hooks.
howToObtain: Reach Level 30 in the Strength skill tree
tips: Focus on timing your dodges. The Uppercut has hyper armor during startup frames.

name: Muay Thai
description: The Art of Eight Limbs. Utilizes punches, kicks, elbows, and knees for devastating multi-hit combos. Known for powerful clinch techniques.
howToObtain: Defeat 50 enemies using only martial arts
tips: The Clinch Knee is unblockable. Use Elbow Strike to break guards. Chain into Roundhouse for max damage.

name: Capoeira
description: Brazilian dance-fighting style known for fluid, unpredictable movements. Combines acrobatics with deceptive kicks that are difficult to read and counter.
tips: Keep moving! Ginga stance regenerates stamina faster. Use Armada to punish blocked attacks.

name: Pro Wrestling
description: Showman combat style with powerful throws and slams. Sacrifices speed for raw power and crowd-pleasing devastation. Todo's preferred secondary style.
howToObtain: Complete the 'True Battle Brother' bond quest with Todo NPC
tips: Suplex deals massive damage but has long windup. Use Clothesline as a gap closer.

name: Shotokan Karate
description: Traditional Japanese striking art emphasizing powerful, precise techniques. Balanced offense and defense with strong counter-attack potential.
howToObtain: Complete Beginner Training at Tokyo Jujutsu High
tips: Reverse Punch has the fastest startup. Use Low Kick to break opponent's stance before combos.
